multilingual_description: On this page, you can input text and instantly translate it into 10 different languages. This translator allows you to get translations into multiple languages at once, which is perfect for those who want to quickly understand text in different languages without doing it one at a time.
photo_description: On this page, you can upload photos with text, and the service will automatically recognize the text using Optical Character Recognition (OCR) technology, and then translate it into 10 different languages. This is the perfect tool for translating text from images such as signs, documents, advertisements, and other visual materials.
color_picker_description: On this page, you can upload an image and pick any color on it using the 'Color Picker' feature. This handy tool allows you to accurately determine the color anywhere on the image and get its value in HEX and RGB formats. The perfect solution for designers, developers, and anyone who works with colors and needs precise color values from images.
ocr_error: Error recognizing text from the image:
invalid_file_format: Invalid file format. Please upload a DOCX file or an image.
color_mixing_description: On this page, you can experiment with different colors by mixing them to create new shades. With the 'Color Mixer' tool, you can add multiple colors, adjust them through the color picker, and see the mixing result in real time. The user-friendly interface allows you to work with colors in HEX format and see how different combinations create new shades, including popular mixes. It's the perfect tool for designers, artists, and anyone working with colors to see how various shades mix and blend.
image_converter_description: On this page, you can easily convert images from one format to another. The converter supports popular formats such as JPEG, PNG, GIF, and others, making it an ideal tool for quick and high-quality image processing. This tool will help you prepare images for websites, social media, and other platforms with minimal effort.
file_too_large: File is too large. Please upload a file not exceeding 10 MB.
conversion_error: An error occurred during the conversion.
image_size_reduction_description: This tool allows you to compress images without losing quality, helping to reduce their size and speed up the loading of web pages. Users can quickly optimize images for websites, apps, and social media, maintaining high quality while reducing file sizes. Image compression is perfect for webmasters, designers, and anyone working with large amounts of graphics on the web.
qr_code_creation_description: On this page, you can quickly and easily create a QR code by entering any text or link. The generator supports instant code updates and allows you to download it as an image. This is perfect for creating QR codes for your business cards, websites, promotions, or personal use.
website_description: This website was developed by two developers in one week. We dedicated a lot of time and effort to create a user-friendly and functional resource that will help you solve your tasks.
specialist_description: A website development specialist with experience in creating creative and functional web solutions. Works with modern technologies to meet the client's needs.
developer_description: Has extensive experience in creating dynamic and interactive web applications. Specializes in database integration and server-side development, ensuring reliability and scalability of projects.
contact_for_website_development: To order website development, contact us and tell us about your project. We will discuss all the details and offer an individual price estimate based on your requirements.
description: On this page, you can quickly and easily shorten any link. Simply paste a long URL in the input field, and you'll get a short, neat link ready for use. This service is perfect for simplifying links for social media, marketing campaigns, emails, or personal use.
generator_description: On this page, you can quickly and easily generate a secure password. Just adjust the settings such as password length and special characters, then click to create a unique password. This service is perfect for creating secure passwords for various accounts and online services.
support_message: If you would like to support our project, you can transfer funds to one of the following cards:
thank_you_message: Any support is important to us. Thank you for your help!
